title: Abana bate uburenganzira bwo kurindwa ihohoterwa mu bihe by’intambara cyangwa ibiza.
content:
Abana bate uburenganzira bwo kurindwa ihohoterwa mu bihe by’intambara cyangwa ibiza. Leta, imiryango iharanira inyungu z’abaturage, imiryango mpu-zamahanga, ingo n’imiryango muri rusange, bate inshingano zo kurengera uburenganzira bwabo.

Kurinda abana mu bihe by’amakimbirane cyangwa se mu biza ni ngombwa kuko bashobora guhungabanywa n’amoko menshi y’ihohoterwa. Ibihe bidasanzwe kandi byongera ihohoterwa nk’irikorerwa mu ngo, ku ishuri n’ihohoterwa abana bagirana hagati yabo.
Abana b’abakobwa n’abagore nibo bibasirwa n’ibibazo byo gucuruzwa no kugirirwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina nko gufatwa ku ngufu biba rimwe na rimwe ari intwaro yo kwifashisha mu ntambara.
Ni ngombwa ko abana n’abo mu miryango yabo bagaragariza ubuyozi, mu gihe gikwiye, ihohoterwa bakorewe.
